title: AI Workshop Announced
content: A hands-on workshop on Artificial Intelligence will be held next week in the main lab.

title: New Python Course Released
content: A new introductory Python programming course is now available for all students.

title: Hackathon Winners
content: Congratulations to the winners of the annual coding hackathon. See the full list on our website.

title: Cybersecurity Seminar
content: Join us for a seminar on the latest trends in cybersecurity, featuring industry experts.

title: Lab Maintenance Scheduled
content: The computer labs will be closed for maintenance this Friday from 8am to 12pm.

title: Research Paper Published
content: Faculty and students have published a new paper on quantum computing in a leading journal.

title: Cloud Computing Resources Updated
content: Cloud computing resources have been upgraded for all enrolled students.

title: Alumni Talk: Careers in Tech
content: An alumni guest speaker will share insights about careers in the tech industry.

title: Exam Timetable Released
content: The final exam timetable for computer science courses is now available online.

title: Robotics Club Meeting
content: The Robotics Club will meet this Thursday to discuss upcoming projects.

title: Internship Opportunities
content: New internship opportunities in software development have been posted on the portal.

title: Database Systems Update
content: The database systems course has updated its syllabus for the next semester.

title: Open Source Contributions
content: Students are encouraged to contribute to open source projects as part of their coursework.

title: New Faculty Member
content: We welcome Dr. Smith to the Computer Science department, specializing in machine learning.

title: App Development Contest
content: Sign up for the upcoming app development contest and showcase your skills.

title: Linux Workshop
content: A beginner-friendly Linux workshop will be held in the computer lab next Monday.
